Title: Before We Go
Writer: Ronald Bass (screenplay), Jen Smolka (screenplay), Chris Shafer (screenplay), Paul Vicknair (screenplay), Ronald Bass (story), Jen Smolka (story)
Actors: Chris Evans, Alice Eve, Emma Fitzpatrick, John Cullum
Plot: A woman misses the 1:30 train from New York to Boston and a street musician spends the night trying to help her make it back home before her husband does. Throughout the night they learn a lot about one another and eventually find a romance.
